name: Forrest Defense
description:
Forrest Defense is a small tower defense prototype. Defend your castle against 10 levels of goblins. Each kill will earn you gold so you can build more towers.

Maps are randomly generated but some common rules apply:

  • Goblins start in the top right corner 
  • Don't let them touch your castle in the bottom left

Maps vary in difficulty, so do not hesitate to retry.

Controls
  • Move map: W/A/S/D or ▲/◄/▼/►
  • Place towers: bottom right button & mouse
3rd Party Assets
  • Build music: Medieval Town by syncopika
  • Fight music: Eye of the Storm by Indieteur
  • Victory music: Victory Fanfare Short by cynicmusic
  • Lost music: Oriental by Ellary
  • Dying sound: Playersounds 1 by Emopreben
  • Arrow sound: Swishes Sound Pack by artisticdude
  • Build sound: Breaking Rock by themightyglider
  • Font: Press Start 2P by CodeMan38

This is just a prototype so features are limited and bugs may appear. Anyway, comments are welcomed.
